instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Accounts & sync . Select an application. Tap Menu . Deselect Sync . Settings vary between different account types.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Accounts & sync . Select an application. Tap the account name to turn sync on or off. Settings vary between different account types.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Accounts & sync . Select an account to view and edit, or select the " + " icon to add an account. Settings will vary between different types of accounts.
